oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jesus Name Tradition homecoming service and Junior Hamlin funeral home movie, 1976 April
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording begins with an outdoor service where members handle serpents. Followed by an indoor service where a man presents his swollen bit hand. The remaining footage is of an outdoor funeral service.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Funeral rites and ceremonies; Homecoming; Snakebites; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
Hamlin, Junior
